General.Name: Jalles Machado S/A
General.Description: Jalles Machado S/A produces, markets, and exports sugar, ethanol, and other by-products from sugarcane. The company offers crystal and organic sugar; hydrated, anhydrous, industrial, and organic ethanol; cleaning products; and yeast. It also produces clean and renewable energy from cane bagasse and straw. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Goianésia, Brazil.
General.Address: Fazenda SAo Pedro, Goianésia, GO, Brazil, 76388-899
